```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

setwd("~/数据/剑网三/rank-analysis/csv")
```

```{r}
Record1 <- read.csv("~/数据/剑网三/rank-analysis/csv/boss1_2.csv")

nrow(Record1)

mean(Record1$finish_time)
sd(Record1$finish_time)

```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(Record1, aes(x = rank, y = finish_time )) + 
  geom_point()
```


```{r}
recordMod <- lm(rank~finish_time, data = Record1)
```


```{r}
summary(recordMod)
```


```{r}
ggplot(Record1, aes(x = rank, y = finish_time)) + 
  geom_point() +
  stat_smooth(method = "lm")
```

```{r}
anova(recordMod)
```
